2026-0041
2026-01-26INFCFinancial Administration ActAppointment of a Chief Executive Officer of the Windsor-Detroit Bridge AuthorityAppointment of Charbel (Chuck) Andary of Lakeshore, Ontario, to be Chief Executive Officer of the Windsor-Detroit Bridge Authority, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.N/A
subject: Appointment of a Chief Executive Officer of the Windsor-Detroit Bridge Authority
precis: Appointment of Charbel (Chuck) Andary of Lakeshore, Ontario, to be Chief Executive Officer of the Windsor-Detroit Bridge Authority, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.
